Class.name: VKReader.Data.User
Class.Description:
This class mirrors (with some properties disabled) functionality of vk user class.
For more information see: http://vk.com/dev/fields

Property.name: ID
Property.Description: Hold user's vk id. This property is unique, has IdKey and PrimaryKey on it.

Property.name: Deactivated
Property.Description:
Hold user's state in vk system.
'existing' - everything is just fine.
'deleted' - user has his account deleted.
'banned' - user has his account banned.

Property.name: Hidden
Property.Description:
Hold 1 iff user set his account up as hidden.
Hold 0 otherwise.

Property.name: Sex
Property.Description:
Hold value corresponding to user's sex.
'0' - user hasn't set this setting yet. '1' - female. '2' - male.

Property.name: DOB
Property.Description: Hold user's date of birth in horolog format.

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Description: Given %Zen.proxyObject with corresponding fields, initialize the object.
